column5: Contribute to healthy living and lifestyles and be a part of new products with this Master’s in Food Innovation.This MSc in Food Innovation is aimed at graduates and professionals looking to build careers in the food science industry (and especially in product development). The course builds your knowledge and understanding of how ingredients are developed and launched, from concept to completion. It is based on the expertise of staff working in areas including human nutrition and public health, food chemistry and microbiology, product development, packaging, food safety, legislation, and sustainability.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, 2-3 years part time
